messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RRe: HELP! ALLERGIES
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry I have gotten so far behind with all the mail-I haven t even seen all the previous posts on this, but Jen would get awful rashes, and finally in
messages.messageBody:
Sorry I have gotten so far behind with all the mail-I haven't even seen all
the previous posts on this, but Jen would get awful rashes, and finally in
desperation I used neosporin and it worked wonders! If it is yeast, any of
the yeast infection creams will get it, if they don't work, go for bacterial
with the neosporin-they even make one with pain relief.

Cathie
>
>My girls are older now, but I remember a bad rash my first one had and I
>put
>a light on her bum while she was sleeping with no diaper on. Or the blow
>dryer on low, but they may not stay still long enough for that!
>Kim
